text: Looking at the docs, there is either Ni**l**earn (small l) or Ni**L**earn (capital l). Any strong preference between the two?
title: Capitalisation of Ni{l,L}earn

text:
Me too 

Sent from my phone. Please forgive brevity and mis spelling
